mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TALKROOM T INNER JOIN MEMBER_TALKROOM MT ON(T.TALKROOM_NO = MT.TALKROOM_NO) AND T.TALKROOM_TYPE = 1 AND MT.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO MANAGER_NO, MT.TALKROOM_NO, M.MEMBER_INTRO MEMBER_INTRO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_IMG MEMBER_IMG, M.MENTOR_VALID MENTOR_VALID FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, TALKROOM_NO FROM MEMBER_TALKROOM WHERE TALKROOM_NO IN ( SELECT MT.TALKROOM_NO FROM MEMBER_TALKROOM MT INNER JOIN TALKROOM T ON(MT.TALKROOM_NO = T.TALKROOM_NO) AND T.TALKROOM_TYPE=1 WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ) AND MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo} ) MT ON (M.MEMBER_NO = MT.MEMBER_NO)
AND M.MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY TALKROOM_NO
SELECT MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_NO = ( SELECT MAX(MESSAGE_NO) MESSAGE_NO FROM MESSAGE WHERE TALKROOM_NO = #{talkroomNo} )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TALKROOM T INNER JOIN MEMBER_TALKROOM MT ON(T.TALKROOM_NO = MT.TALKROOM_NO) AND T.TALKROOM_TYPE = 2 AND MT.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT MT.TALKROOM_NO TALKROOM_NO, T.MANAGER_NO MANAGER_NO, T.STUDY_NO STUDY_NO, T.TALKROOM_TYPE TALKROOM_TYPE, S.STUDY_NAME STUDY_NAME, S.STUDY_IMG STUDY_IMG, MSG.MESSAGE_CONTENT MESSAGE_CONTENT FROM MEMBER_TALKROOM MT INNER JOIN TALKROOM T ON (MT.TALKROOM_NO = T.TALKROOM_NO) AND MT.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND TALKROOM_TYPE = 2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(MESSAGE_NO) AS MESSAGE_NO, TALKROOM_NO FROM MESSAGE GROUP BY TALKROOM_NO ) MNO ON (MT.TALKROOM_NO = MNO.TALKROOM_NO) LEFT JOIN MESSAGE MSG ON (MNO.MESSAGE_NO = MSG.MESSAGE_NO) INNER JOIN STUDY S ON (T.STUDY_NO = S.STUDY_NO)
AND S.STUDY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT MSG.MESSAGE_NO , MSG.TALKROOM_NO , MSG.MEMBER_NO , M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_IMG, MSG.MESSAGE_CONTENT , MSG.MESSAGE_DATE FROM MESSAGE MSG INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = MSG.MEMBER_NO) AND MSG.TALKROOM_NO = #{talkroomNo} ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPLY_LOG WHERE RECIPIENT_NO = #{memberNo} AND APPLY_DATE IS NULL

SELECT APPLY_NO , APPLICANT_NO , RECIPIENT_NO , AL.STUDY_NO , APPLY_KIND , APPLY_DATE , MEMBER_NICKNAME , MEMBER_IMG, STUDY_NAME FROM APPLY_LOG AL INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON(AL.APPLICANT_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) AND RECIPIENT_NO = #{memberNo} AND APPLY_DATE IS NULL
AND M.MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
LEFT JOIN STUDY S ON (AL.STUDY_NO = S.STUDY_NO)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE( MESSAGE_NO, TALKROOM_NO, MEMBER_NO, MESSAGE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{talkroomNo}, #{memberNo}, #{messageContent} )
INSERT INTO TALKROOM( TALKROOM_NO, MANAGER_NO, TALKROOM_TYPE ) VALUES ( TALKROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, 1 )
INSERT INTO TALKROOM( TALKROOM_NO, MANAGER_NO, STUDY_NO, TALKROOM_TYPE ) VALUES ( TALKROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, STUDY_SEQ.CURRVAL, 2 )
INSERT INTO MEMBER_TALKROOM( MEMBER_NO, TALKROOM_NO ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, TALKROOM_SEQ.CURRVAL )
